about_the_game:
Join the Dreamers in the fight against Muma with the Season Pass!
To protect the peace of the Earth. To protect the dreams of everyone.

This Season Pass will save you 10% compared to buying all 12 chapters of this game one by one every week!
You can now enjoy "STAR MELODY YUMEMI-DREAMER" with the ease of one single purchase!

Season Pass Contents

"STAR MELODY YUMEMI-DREAMER" chapters 1-12

*After purchasing the Season Pass, you will no longer need to purchase each episode individually. Please be careful not to duplicate purchases.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2GHz以上
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720、フルカラー表示が可能な環境
  • DirectX: Version 8.1
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Get all 12 chapters with a 10% discount!
supported_languages:
Japanese*, English, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
